#summary Current feature list
#labels Featured

*Basic Features*

  * Status updates
  * Home/Friends timeline
  * Replies timeline
  * Public timeline
  * Followers
  * Directs (display only, broken)
  * Search
  * Paging
  * Delete tweets

*Geeky Features*

  * Phone detection and handling
  * Hashtags are search links
  * Automatic link shortening using http://is.gd
  * Google Wireless Transcoder for external links
  * Username and password stored in an encrypted cookie

*Future Features*

  * Retweet
  * Local search
  * Google Gears Mobile location lookup (Windows Mobile only)
